Sentencas: Perovskite-type mixed oxides, such as La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3 compounds, are at the present time one of the most widely used materials for cathode of intermediate temperature solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 nanotubes for cathode of solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A significant increase of the specific are a of the cathode can be achieved by preparing structures on the nanometric scale.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 nanotubes for cathode of solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, nanocrystalline tubular structures of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3, and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 were synthesized by denitration, using polycarbonate porous templates, microwave irradiation and a further calcination at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 nanotubes for cathode of solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The shape and size of the tubes are determined by the characteristics of the template pores.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 nanotubes for cathode of solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The final thermal treatment is needed to obtain the desired perosvkite-type crystal structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 nanotubes for cathode of solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The resulting products were studied by means of X-ray diffraction and electron microscopy techniques.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 nanotubes for cathode of solid-oxide fuel cells
